title: The Red Hook Recipe
full_text:
The Red Hook Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
rye whiskey
1/2
ounce
Punt e Mes
1/4 to 1/2
ounce
maraschino liqueur
, to taste
Directions
Pour ingredients into mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir briskly for 30 seconds; strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Special equipment
mixing glass, cocktail strainer
Whiskey
